text: Les Clouzeaux is a former commune. It is in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department. It is in the west of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Aubigny-les-Clouzeaux.Arrêté préfectoral 3 December 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Vendée
title: Les Clouzeaux
